description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT...and other legal statements.
full_summary:
Tender Notice
================

**Title:** Tester, Material Strength
---------------------------------

**Gathering Information**
---------------------------

Contracting Entity:        Department of National Defence

Contracting Address:
101 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2
Canada

**Procurement Requirements**
---------------------------

The Department of National Defence is seeking a proposal for the supply of Material Strength Testers, with the following details:

*   **Item 1:**
    *   **GSIN Code:**
        6635 – Physical Properties Testing Equipment
    *   **Quantity:**
        7 test units
    *   **Recommended Delivery Date:**
        30 January 2022
    *   **Special Requirements:**
        Bidders offering equivalent or substitute products must provide the brand name, model number, and part number for the item being proposed.

**Tender Description**
----------------------

A Notice of Proposed Procurement has been issued. To accommodate reduced business hours and limited staff available at the specified bid unit due to the impact of COVID-19, bidders are encouraged to use the epost connect service for electronic transmission of their bids.

Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada. The contracting entity reserves the right to negotiate with the winning supplier on procurement matters.

**Commercial Terms**
-------------------

*   **Trade Agreements:**
    The bid is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.
*   **List of Countries:**
    The tender is open for bids from countries worldwide.
*   **Local Delivery:**
    The procurement is aimed for supply to the Canadian territory.

**Additional Information**
--------------------------

*   **Bid Deadline:** 3 January 2023 at 14:00 (Local Time)
*   **Attachment documents:** Available online for download at the official Government of Canada tender portal
*   **Contact Information:** Danny Lebel ([dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca))

Please note that the bid has already expired, therefore it is not possible to submit a bid proposal. 

Please do follow 400 words constraint, rest CAM hides now!   



Note this is a tenders that was already closed and cannot be re-submitted.
